gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 114, Spurs 95
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bulls defeated the Spurs, 114-95. Coby White led the Bulls with 22 points (10-15 FG), six rebounds, and five assists as DeMar DeRozan totaled 21 points, four rebounds, and five assists. Devin Vassell led San Antonio with 21 points while Zach Collins added 14 points, nine rebounds, and three blocks. The Bulls have won three in a row and improve to 13-17 as the Spurs move to 4-23.
